meanings.definition: To crush or flatten with a steamroller.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers steamrolls the road to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The steamroller steamrolls the asphalt to create a flat surface.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy accidentally steamrolls over the sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: His powerful voice steamrolls through the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The giant steamroller steamrolls everything in its path, leaving no obstacles behind.

meanings.sent1: The champion wrestler steamrolls his opponent with ease.
meanings.sent2: The dictator steamrolls any opposition to maintain control.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic team steamrolls their way to victory in the game.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter steamrolls through the room, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The powerful storm steamrolls through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: To proceed with relentless force or speed.
meanings.sent1: The marathon runner steamrolls towards the finish line with determination.
meanings.sent2: The ambitious project steamrolls ahead despite challenges.
meanings.sent3: The excited child steamrolls through the park, eager to play on the swings.
meanings.sent4: The urgent message steamrolls through the office, demanding immediate attention.
meanings.sent5: The unstoppable train steamrolls through the countryside, reaching its destination in record time.
